post.body: haha i'm glad you got to go :)
i got that one for christmas and i am absolutely in love.
hahahahahahaha so i see you're reading. the shrubs were a dare. you know how it is.
hot water+honey+lemon=salvation. more honey than lemon. and if you have raspberry leaves, you're set for life
oh no... feel better... :/
indeed, but we all have our share of trivial issues. @dslegall oh yes, i did, but don't tell anyone charming...
life is very stressful and difficult sometimes.
yay! here it is: http://tinyurl.com/8d468p
it's in the public folder but i have no idea what that means...
no you should see this house. i thought the one in nj was the most intense in the world... until i saw this one
random flashback. feb 14 2008. "i called to say i love you" "aw, love you too. btw did i leave my pants at your house?"
watching 'love actually'. this movie is absolutely adorable
Home. I love guitar hero.
What exactly is this boxing day business?
I really hate deleting text messages...
yay christmas parties and not staying at them! @dslegall my family is more willing to give me things i shouldn't have than yours i see
Aunt martha is wearing a thong. Omg.
MERRY CHRISTMAS twitterbugs. @dslegall guess what? its on dropbox. but idk how to get there?
maybe it's bc it's christmas and he doesn't want the baby jesus to know...? lol
MERRY CHRISTMAS! @dslegall yes yes you are. don't let anyone tell you otherwise.
